remarks: Value of the function for the vector subtraction operation on a normed complex vector space.  (Contributed by NM, 15-Feb-2008.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-Dec-2014.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
vsfval.2 $e |- G = ( +v ` U ) $.
vsfval.3 $e |- M = ( -v ` U ) $.
vsfval $p |- M = ( /g ` G ) $.
